metadata.title: CVE-2021-39247 on Ubuntu 24.04 LTS. (noble) - low
metadata.description:
Zint Barcode Generator before 2.10.0 has a one-byte buffer over-read,related to is_last_single_ascii in code1.c, and rs_encode_uint inreedsol.c.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2021-39247` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

libzint2.12 - 2.11.0-1
zint - 2.11.0-1
zint-qt - 2.11.0-1
No subscription required

criterions.comment: zint package in noble, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '2.11.0-1').
